Additional Notes: Transitions to Jab 3 on frame 10. Rapid on frame 9.
Head and arm intangibility on frame 8-9. Wing intangibility on frame 8-12
Leg intangibility on frame 12-16. Charge hold is frame 6
If Ridley is hit in the mouth while charging on frame 16-45, he recoils in a 52 frame animation.
Landing hitbox on frame 1 after a grab, then transitions to ground drag
Drag begins on 24. Deals damage every four frames.
Can manually release on 48 on the ground. 43 in the air.
Second landing lag is for a dive into the ground. Wing intangibility on frame 37-60
Total frames is 67 when you miss.
